question: Irene didn’t buy the blue skirt because she didn’t have enough money.

answers.text: If Irene had enough money, she would have bought the blue skirt.
If Irene would have had enough money, she would have bought the blue skirt.
If Irene had had enough money, she would have bought the blue skirt.

correct_answer: If Irene had had enough money, she would have bought the blue skirt.
